quest.name: A Whale's Tale
journal: Urianger has a mind to call on an old, old friend.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: It doesn't feel all that honorable or heroic to strike first, but if it leads to less bloodshed in the end...

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Why do these problems always turn out to be so much more complex than they seem? Couldn't we have a simple, straightforward adventure for once? The good guys good, the bad guys bad, no drama or intrigue, and it all ends with tea and tarts!

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: The will of the ancients... If only it were so simple.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: I would not care for what happened in Limsa to be repeated a world away. The benthos know not what they do...

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: Is it wrong of me to be a bit excited? I know the circumstances are grave, but imagine what those ruins might hold!

dialogue.name: TOLSHSAATH
dialogue.text: （★未使用／削除予定★）

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: Though our course hath been decided, to pursue it we must needs beseech the aid of a friend.

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: Aye, I speak of Bismarck. Pray follow me to Sullen that we might seek an audience with him once more.

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: From here, we press onward to the Isle of Ken. I myself shall proceed on foot.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: You've perfected your technique, then?

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: Just so─the water will be as glass beneath my feet, and provideth purchase fragile yet true. Watch closely.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: Oh, I certainly shall.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Forgive me, but would it not be easier to perfect your swimming technique?

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: Aye, 'twould be a pity if you drowned. Truly.

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: Oh, hush. I'm sure it'll be brilliant!

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: He's done it!

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: Incredible!

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: Urianger!

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: For the love of─

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: M-Mine apologies. The technique requireth the purest of focus, and mine...'twas lacking.

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: To perfect this magick I went so far as to deal with the Fuath, and with their aid mine efforts finally met with success...albeit on a single occasion.

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: I know not why I cannot repeat it.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: I thought I saw you waver a bit toward the end there. Perhaps you're simply...tired...?

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: Thancred!?

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: It's nothing to worry about─only a dizzy spell. Though it may not be wise to go for another swim just now...

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: Thankfully, we have an alternative. A wonderful little invention, I'm certain you'll agree.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: I must admit I'd been keen to attempt walking on water myself. Though I know what Alisaie would say...

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: I'll stick to swimming, thank you very much.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: What sort of dealings with the Fuath, I wonder...

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: （★未使用／削除予定★）

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: Before you make some quip about age catching up with me─you'd be out of breath too, if you had to drag Urianger out of the sea without so much as a warm-up.

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: Do you think those two are really all right? Perhaps we should take a moment to rest.

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: I will petition Bismarck's aid on our behalf. Let us pray my diplomacy proveth more effective than mine experimental magicks...

dialogue.name: BISMARCK
dialogue.text: (-Bismarck-)[You speak with the voice of the king, little neighbors. I will not deny you.]

dialogue.name: BISMARCK
dialogue.text: (-Bismarck-)[As before, if you seek what sleeps beneath the sea, I will be your guide.]

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: [Thy kindness is as boundless as the depths, serene one.]

dialogue.name: BISMARCK
dialogue.text: (-Bismarck-)[Before we depart, however, I would ask a favor.]

dialogue.name: BISMARCK
dialogue.text: (-Bismarck-)[After our last flight, I found many creatures clinging to me. I am...itchy.]

dialogue.name: BISMARCK
dialogue.text: (-Bismarck-)[Remove them, and I will take you below.]

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: [With all haste shall it be done.]

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: So? Did he agree?

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: Aye, though I agreed to a favor in kind...

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: Regrettably, 'tis not one I possess the power to grant. Bismarck hath asked us to cleanse his underbelly of barnacles.

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: Alas, one must needs dive beneath the surface to do so. Even if I could master the power to walk upon it, it would avail me naught.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Oh, for heavens' sake, is that all!? Forename and I are more than capable of that.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: With the Kojin's blessing, we'll have done with it in moments─and better that than standing here and listening to this nonsense! I'll take the right, you the left. Now go!

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: ...I am in your debt.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: None of us is much of a match for Alisaie when she's like this. Aside from Y'shtola, perhaps.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: I can handle this area.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: It's a minor miracle that we accomplish anything at all, wouldn't you say?

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: Mine apologies. This venture hath not proceeded as smoothly as I had hoped...

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: Yes, I'm perfectly well recovered, thank you.

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: (Psst! I think Thancred's embarrassed.)

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: After a good deal of prying from various angles, you dislodge the barnacle.

dialogue.name: ALPHINAUD
dialogue.text: The power to breathe underwater seems most convenient. Mayhap the Kojin might be persuaded to grant me it when we return to the Source─I can swim, after all.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Well, that was disgusting. I pray we'll not be required to attend to any other matters of personal hygiene.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: I take it you've finished?

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: Apologies for sitting this one out, but it did seem more appropriate for those of you with the Kojin's blessing to handle it.

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: Would you please keep an eye on Thancred and Urianger? I'm still not convinced they're all right...

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: Thine efforts are most sincerely appreciated. I will inform Bismarck that we may depart without further delay.

dialogue.name: BISMARCK
dialogue.text: (-Bismarck-)[Much, much better. Thank you, little neighbors.]

dialogue.name: BISMARCK
dialogue.text: (-Bismarck-)[I remember...a long time ago, another did this favor for me.]

dialogue.name: BISMARCK
dialogue.text: (-Bismarck-)[After the Flood, when I chose this spot for my slumber... He came and made a home on my back. Ken was his name.]

dialogue.name: BISMARCK
dialogue.text: (-Bismarck-)[When I grew itchy, I stirred. But he was not afraid. No─he asked me what was wrong.]

dialogue.name: BISMARCK
dialogue.text: (-Bismarck-)[I told him of the creatures clinging to my belly, and he dove into the water. He helped me. He was my friend.]

dialogue.name: BISMARCK
dialogue.text: (-Bismarck-)[He told me he wished to live in peace, away from his people and their wars. This, I understood.]

dialogue.name: BISMARCK
dialogue.text: (-Bismarck-)[I treasured our time together, brief though it was. Brief though it always is. But I remember him, and how he laughed when we flew...]

dialogue.name: BISMARCK
dialogue.text: (-Bismarck-)[...I remember when he slept. I too slept that day, and many days since.]

dialogue.name: BISMARCK
dialogue.text: (-Bismarck-)[But the light fades and the darkness returns. Ken sleeps, but in memory he laughs, and together we fly. And I am here. I am awake.]

dialogue.name: BISMARCK
dialogue.text: (-Bismarck-)[Mmm... It feels good to speak and to be heard again. A shame others cannot understand me.]

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: [If thou art willing to learn, I would gladly teach thee the language of man.]

dialogue.name: BISMARCK
dialogue.text: (-Bismarck-)[Thank you, little friend. But it is time I grant you your request.]

dialogue.name: BISMARCK
dialogue.text: (-Bismarck-)[But first, I will take flight to cleanse my body and prepare. The dive will be swift, and I would not have you struck by errant debris.]

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: So this “island” was named for a man. How easily the past is forgotten.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: He passed not even one hundred years ago, yet the truth has slipped from history. Like so many grains of sand...

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: ...Might I have some explanation of what he just said, or shall we all stand about making vague and mysterious allusions?

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: While he maketh ready to deliver us unto our destination, Bismarck bade us wait for him on the shore of Kholusia.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: That's all...? I feel as though there was more to it.

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: Indeed, there was...but it hath no bearing on the task at hand. I should be glad to share the rest with you anon.

dialogue.name: ALISAIE
dialogue.text: Fine. Later, then.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: If Bismarck requires time to prepare, might I suggest a short respite? For Urianger and Thancred, in particular.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: I require no such thing. I am the picture of perfect health.

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: Mine was but a momentary lapse in concentration. Worry not on my account.

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: You mustn't push yourselves so! Please, rest! For me?

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: Oh, all right. If you insist.

dialogue.name: RYNE
dialogue.text: You too, Forename! You've been running yourself ragged!

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: Yes, ma'am.

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: But I feel fine...

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: Just go quietly, Forename. Trust me.

dialogue.name: YSHTOLA
dialogue.text: In that case, I leave the old men in your care. The rest of us will meet you at the Split Hull anon.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: <sigh> Word of advice─never let it show. When she realizes she's struck a nerve, she remembers. By the gods, she remembers...

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: In any case, if we must be made to rest, I know a place in Sullen that's better for it than most. Come with me.

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: With age cometh wisdom─or so I pray.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: May as well have a seat. We wouldn't want our elderly knees to give out.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: To hear her speak you'd think I'm on my deathbed. By the Twelve, I wish that girl wouldn't worry so much.

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: Thy countenance belies thy words, Master Thancred.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: I'm sure I don't know what you mean. Let the record show that I am here under protest.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: ...Though I can't say I mind the view.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: And if the abundance of anglers is any indication, even an amateur might land an impressive catch. Shall we try our hands at it?

dialogue.name: PANICKEDFISHER
dialogue.text: Help! Someone...<pant>...quickly!

dialogue.name: PANICKEDFISHER
dialogue.text: It's Nightshade! We was attacked on the road from the Crystarium─barely escaped with me life!

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: I suppose we might have predicted this.

dialogue.name: PANICKEDFISHER
dialogue.text: Y-You mean you'll help? For free? Th-Thank you!

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: If I recall correctly, “Nightshade” is a local band of outlaws.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: I doubt they'll trouble us overmuch. No more than they already have by interrupting our relaxation, at any rate.

dialogue.name: FISHERA03768
dialogue.text: We was ambushed. I ran, but my friend...he weren't fast enough.

dialogue.name: FISHERB03768
dialogue.text: Can you believe this? I don't even have anything worth stealing!

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: All save our miscreant appear unharmed.

dialogue.name: SOLDIER03608
dialogue.text: Fortunately, this one wasn't clever enough to bring support.

dialogue.name: BRAVESOLDIER
dialogue.text: Never fear! Nightshade ain't no match for the guard.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: These two have matters well in hand, by the looks of it.

dialogue.name: FISHERB03768
dialogue.text: I'll not forget this kindness. May we meet again!

dialogue.name: SOLDIER03608
dialogue.text: Is that you, miladysir? Don't tell me we just deprived that poor fellow the honor of being rescued by the Warrior of Darkness! We had no idea you were in the area. Fancy us meeting again so soon, eh? Why, I believe I even recognize your companion.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: ...Ah yes! From the infirmary. You had a message for the Crystal Exarch, did you not? It's good to see you back on your feet─and on patrol, no less!

dialogue.name: SOLDIER03608
dialogue.text: Oh, it's nothing as official as all that! Strictly speaking, we're off duty. But as we had a free moment, we thought we'd give a few of the less-traveled roads a look. The guard doesn't have enough hands to patrol them regularly, you see.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: That's admirable. There are few so devoted to their duty─in Lakeland or beyond.

dialogue.name: SOLDIER03608
dialogue.text: Well, we've been talking about it for a while, and neither of us is satisfied with just seeing out our service. It feels like we could be doing more─like we should be doing more.

dialogue.name: BRAVESOLDIER
dialogue.text: (-Gallant Guardsman-)It's all about having the will to help your fellow man, and the resolve to see it through!

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: What will you say?

dialogue.name: A1
dialogue.text: I remember you. The excitable one.

dialogue.name: A2
dialogue.text: Very good, mister...uh...?

dialogue.name: BRAVESOLDIER
dialogue.text: Sorry, miladysir! I got a bit overexcited the other day─couldn't get my words out.

dialogue.name: BRAVESOLDIER
dialogue.text: (-Vonard-)The name's Vonard, miladysir. I'm with the guard, but I don't just want to protect Lakeland─I want to protect the lot. Just like the Warriors of Light.

dialogue.name: SOLDIER03608
dialogue.text: Sadly, our duties prevent us from venturing too far from our own little corner of Norvrandt.

dialogue.name: SOLDIER03608
dialogue.text: What we'd really like to do is travel─to better ourselves, and go where the need is greatest...

dialogue.name: SOLDIER03608
dialogue.text: But everyone has to start somewhere, don't they? For now, if we can stop Nightshade from robbing the odd fisherman, then that's what we'll do.

dialogue.name: THANCRED
dialogue.text: Well, well... Future heroes of the First, do you think?

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: They want not for spirit. 'Tis but a pity they draw inspiration from so clouded a wellspring...

dialogue.name: URIANGER
dialogue.text: Yet it availeth us naught to fret in idleness. We must needs press on if we are to bring Elidibus's schemes to light.
